name: DCU
description: The official rebooted cinematic universe spearheaded by James Gunn and Peter Safran. Chapter 1, titled 'Gods and Monsters', begins with the animated series 'Creature Commandos'.

media.name: Waller
media.timeline_note: This series follows the character of Amanda Waller, with Viola Davis reprising her role from the DCEU's 'Peacemaker' series. It serves as a bridge between the old and new universes.

media.name: Paradise Lost
media.timeline_note: A drama set in Themyscira, the home of the Amazons, said to focus on political intrigue before the birth of Diana (Wonder Woman).

media.name: Untitled Wonder Woman Reboot
media.timeline_note: Following the success of 'Superman', a reboot film for Wonder Woman has reportedly been fast-tracked.

relationships.reason: Serves as a wide-scale reboot of the previous cinematic universe, with some actors and character threads carrying over.
